content:
The Wolverhampton Fiesta is a popular summer event in the city, and it features music from a range of genres. The event typically hosts a main stage where popular bands and artists perform, as well as other smaller stages spread out across the park. 

In the past, the main stage of the Wolverhampton Fiesta has seen performances by a range of artists covering different genres such as pop, rock, electronic, and indie. Some previous headliners include Shane Filan, Fleur East, and JLS.

Aside from the main stage, the smaller stages usually offer a diverse range of live music, from classical and jazz to local and world music. Additionally, the event has a carnival-like atmosphere, and often features fairground rides, food stalls, and entertainment for kids.
